```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1234)

beta <- set_names(rnorm(4), 0:3)

x <- expand_grid(iter = 1:1e2,
                 id = 1:1e2) |> 
  mutate(x1 = rnorm(n()),
         x2 = rnorm(n()),
         x3 = rnorm(n()))

y <- expand_grid(model = 0:3,
                 x) |> 
  mutate(y_true = case_match(model,
                             0 ~ beta["0"],
                             1 ~ beta["0"] + beta["1"] * x1,
                             2 ~ beta["0"] + beta["1"] * x1 + beta["2"] * x2,
                             3 ~ beta["0"] + beta["1"] * x1 + beta["2"] * x2 + beta["3"] * x3),
         y_obs = y_true + rnorm(n()))
```
